modName: Summon Vampire Cattle - A Vampire Feeding Mod
summary:
Requires Dawnguard.

This mod adds a spell tome that gives you the power to summon a Vampire Catlle for 10 seconds.

You can buy the spell tome from Ronthil in Volkihar Keep.
It's a power so you can only use it once a day.
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dawnguard.

About this mod:
This mod gives you the power to summon a Vampire Catlle for 20 seconds. Works for every vampire.

How to obtain:
You can buy the spell tome from Ronthil in Volkihar Keep.
It's a power so you can only use it once a day.

Download for Skyrim Special Edition here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/910/?

You can also find it by going to Haemar's Shame. It's inside the cave near the enterance. Look at the pictures for an exact location.

Changelog:
Version 2.0: Mod optimised to be compatible with other vampire mods, thanks to MofoMojo. Stable release.
Version 1.2: Every vampire can now feed. You don't need to join the vampire faction anymore. Enjoy.
Version 1.1: The spell tome can now be found inside Haemar's Shame near the enterance. Please look at the pictures if you can't find it.

Credits:
Me: for making the mod.
MofoMojo: helping me fix the mod.
author: Skyes666
